level.heading: Registry of out-of-state custody decrees and proceedings. [Repealed]
Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-200, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-4501.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-159, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-4502.
For D.C. Law 13-293, see notes following § 16-4501.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 16 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction Act. See Volume 9, Part IA Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
